alert.note: Alert for Morgan (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 14 at 5:31AM MDT until June 16 at 10:00PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON MDT TODAY... * WHAT...Small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall. * WHERE...The Bijou Creek Basin in east central and northeast Colorado, including the following counties, in east central Colorado, Elbert. In northeast Colorado, Adams, Arapahoe and Morgan. * WHEN...Until noon MDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. Low-water crossings are inundated with water and may not be passable. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 525 AM MDT, Bijou Creek and its tributaries continue to subside. However, many roads remain closed due to existing flooding or washed out roads. - This includes the following streams and drainages... Bijou Creek basin including East Bijou, Middle Bijou and West Bijou Creeks and their tributaries. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Deer Trail, Byers, Agate, Leader, Hoyt and Hoyt Beet Dump.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
